job_tasks.phrase: design and development of features and services
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly relates to the creation of software components and functionalities.

job_tasks.phrase: resolving technical problems as they arise
job_tasks.justification: This describes the debugging and problem-solving aspects inherent in software development.

job_tasks.phrase: Take ownership of the entire development process, from design to production
job_tasks.justification: This implies responsibility for the end-to-end lifecycle of a product, including deployment to production.

job_tasks.phrase: ensuring quality, automation tests, and efficient deployment
job_tasks.justification: Automation tests and efficient deployment are key components of MLOps and CI/CD pipelines.

job_tasks.phrase: Oversee the maintenance and improvement of existing functionality
job_tasks.justification: This refers to the ongoing support and enhancement of software systems.

job_tasks.phrase: ensuring code quality and alignment with business needs
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the importance of understanding and meeting business requirements.
This involves understanding customer requirements and designing technical solutions.

job_tasks.phrase: communication with the customer's technical team
job_tasks.justification: This involves understanding and communicating technical matters with external stakeholders.

job_tasks.phrase: Managing onboarding implementation projects for enterprise and large customers
job_tasks.justification: This indicates involvement in projects that directly relate to customer business needs and implementation.

job_tasks.phrase: Tracking and communicating project status, issues, decisions, and action items to internal and external key stakeholders
job_tasks.justification: This involves understanding project progress and communicating it to relevant parties, including business stakeholders.

job_tasks.phrase: Team performance management and PDP (Professional Development Plan) for team members
job_tasks.justification: While operational, performance management is tied to business outcomes and team effectiveness.
Facilitating agile ceremonies implies understanding project management and team workflow to meet business objectives.

soft_skills.phrase: Take ownership of the entire development process
Encourage and facilitate the generation of innovative engineering ideas and solutions
communication with the customer's technical team
Tracking and communicating project status, issues, decisions, and action items to internal and external key stakeholders
resolving technical problems as they arise

classification.rationale: This job description heavily emphasizes traditional software development, project management, and customer integration. There is no mention of generative AI models, LLMs, RAG, or related technologies. Therefore, it does not fit the profile of a GenAI Engineer.
